name: Pink Diamond
description:
You awake chained, unable to move, in a strange place. You don´t know who you are or who are those strange creatures. 

Try to unravel this mystery while in lockdown. Are you a friend or are you a foe?

Controls:

Left Mouse click over the text boxes

Credits:
